trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a XAML writer attempts to write a value for a duplicate member into the same object node.
trans-unit.target: XAML 寫入器會嘗試將值寫入至相同的物件節點重複的成員時，會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If you handle this exception from a XAML node stream, members might be reported as duplicates in several possible situations.
trans-unit.target: 如果您處理 XAML 節點資料流從這個例外狀況時，成員可能會報告為幾個可能的情況中重複的資料。

trans-unit.source: For example, an explicit property element for a XAML content property might be preceded by whitespace that is interpreted as content, if the collection is whitespace significant.
trans-unit.target: 例如，XAML 內容屬性的明確的屬性項目可能會加上空格會解譯為內容，如果集合是空白字元。

trans-unit.source: Or the XAML writer might be attempting to reset a property that should instead be using a `GetObject` default value.
trans-unit.target: 或 XAML 寫入器可能會嘗試重設此屬性，應改用`GetObject`預設值。

trans-unit.source: If you analyze individual nodes in the XAML node stream, you can often determine the source of the problem.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要分析 XAML 節點資料流中的個別節點，您通常可以判斷問題的來源。

trans-unit.source: If a XAML object writer provides special handing for duplicate members, it can prevent some duplicate member exceptions if you specify <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriterSettings.SkipDuplicatePropertyCheck%2A> as `true` in <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriterSettings> that initialize the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter>.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XAML 物件寫入器提供特殊的處理重複的成員，它就可以防止某些重複的成員例外狀況，如果您指定<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriterSettings.SkipDuplicatePropertyCheck%2A>為`true`中<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriterSettings>的初始化<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter>.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriter> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriterSettings> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectWriterSettings.SkipDuplicatePropertyCheck%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDuplicateMemberException"></xref> class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDuplicateMemberException"></xref>以系統提供的訊息描述錯誤的類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDuplicateMemberException"></xref> class with a specified message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDuplicateMemberException"></xref>具有指定的訊息描述錯誤的類別。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述例外狀況訊息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端，才能確保這個字串已經被當地語系化為目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDuplicateMemberException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDuplicateMemberException"></xref>使用序列化資料的類別。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 保存序列化的物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: info is .
trans-unit.target: infois .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDuplicateMemberException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDuplicateMemberException"></xref>類別指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 做為前一個例外狀況直接結果應該包括在前一個例外狀況的參考就會擲回的例外狀況<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性會傳回相同的值傳遞到建構函式，或`null`如果<xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式。</xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> </xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述例外狀況訊息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式的呼叫端，才能確保這個字串已經被當地語系化為目前的系統文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 造成目前例外狀況的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If the `innerException` parameter is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the current exception is raised in a <xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果`innerException`參數不是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>中, 引發目前的例外狀況<xref uid="langword_csharp_catch" name="catch" href=""></xref>處理內部例外狀況區塊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDuplicateMemberException"></xref> class with the relevant member and type information to report.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDuplicateMemberException"></xref>報表的相關成員和類型資訊的類別。

trans-unit.source: The XAML member identifier to report.
trans-unit.target: 要報告的 XAML 成員識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The XAML type identifier to report as the parent type.
trans-unit.target: 要報表，因為父類型的 XAML 型別識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XAML member identifier for the property to report as a duplicate.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要報告為重複項目之屬性的 XAML 成員識別項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlMember"></xref> object (XAML member identifier) to report.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlMember"> </xref>物件 （XAML 成員識別項） 至報表。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDuplicateMemberException"></xref> class with serialized data.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlDuplicateMemberException"></xref>使用序列化資料的類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object that is transmitted over a stream.
trans-unit.target: 重新構成經由資料流傳輸的例外狀況物件的還原序列化期間呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the serialized object data.
trans-unit.target: 保存序列化的物件資料的物件。

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: 關於來源或目的端內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: info is .
trans-unit.target: infois .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the XAML type identifier to report as the parent type.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定報表做為父類型的 XAML 類型識別項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref> object (XAML type identifier) to report as the parent type.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"> </xref>物件的報表，因為父類型 （XAML 類型識別項）。
